Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant c.596G>A (p.R206H) caused a complete loss of function, as demonstrated by the absence of protein activity in both HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each cell line.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate in both HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control in both HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control in both HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis in both HeLa and 293T cell lines.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein activity greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein activity less than 50% on day 7.
